pages.title: Rehydrating Dry Plants
pages.text: Milling clay balls can provide a few different dry items that can be filled with water with a spout to rehydrate them! $(br2)Note that this takes a lot of time and water.

pages.title: Rehydrated Plants
pages.text: After obtaining sugar cane, kelp and wheat seeds, you now have some more farm-able resources. $(br)Upon successfully rehydrating wheat seeds, you will unlock the ability to bonemeal grass blocks.
